6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Abbas said:"I prayed with the Prophet (ﷺ) in Al-Madinah, eight together and seven together. He delayed Zuhr and brought 'Asr forward, and he delayed Maghrib and brought 'Isha' forward

chapter.ara-name: باب الْوَقْتِ الَّذِي يَجْمَعُ فِيهِ الْمُقِيمُ
chapter.eng-name: Times During Which A Resident May Combine Prayers
